label: 准母
対訳語: Sovereign's Mother by Legal Fiction - or Ex-Sovereign's Mother by Legal Fiction
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: A woman who was treated as the Sovereign's (Tennō's) or Ex-Sovereign's (In's) mother and the mother of his close male relatives. This fiction was carried out in order that certain women might be made Empresses (Kōgō, or Chūgū ), or be given palace names (ingō ), or in order that their sons might be made Imperial Princes (Shinnō) or Priestly Imperial Princes (Hōshinnō ).
